cs.AR, cs.DS, cs.DM, cs.CC, cs.LO. 

The paper deals with the problem of constructing fast circuits for the carry bit computation in binary addition, which is a fundamental problem in computer science. The paper presents an algorithm that computes the fastest known Boolean circuit for an \aop~ with given arrival times for the input signals. This problem is related to several sub-fields of computer science, including algorithms and complexity (cs.AR), data structures (cs.DS), discrete mathematics (cs.DM), computational complexity (cs.CC), and logic in computer science (cs.LO).
